t: The History of Your Wolf Range and Oven | Box Appliance
s: September 16, 2019 - Back in 1934, the Wolf brothers, Al and Hyman, set up shop repairing and reconditioning household kitchen ranges and became so well known for their ability to modify appliances to customer specifications that local Los Angeles restaurants ordered ranges for their own kitchens.

Wolf Brand Overview
s: June 13, 2023 - The Wolf residential cooking brand is owned by Sub Zero, a third-generation family owned company specializing in luxury refrigeration. Wolf cooking appliances are designed, built, and supported with the same quality you should expect from Sub Zero. Wolf appliances are tested for a 20-year life expectancy with regular use.
